double vec: { 1.123456789, 2.123456789, 3.123456789 }
float  vec: { 1.123456836, 2.123456717, 3.123456717 }
2 * a = { 2.246913578, 4.246913578, 6.246913578 } (int * vec<double>)
complex vec: { (1,1), (2,0), (0,3) }
a = { 1.123456789, 2.123456789, 3.123456789 }
d = { 1.123456788, 2.123456788, 3.123456788 }
approx works for vec<double>
